text: Chiloda (Naroda) is a census town in Gandhinagar district in the state of Gujarat, India. ==Demographics== India census, Nana Chiloda (Naroda) old name of Chiloda (Baraiya) had a population of 4457. Males constituted 55% of the population and females 45%. Chiloda (Gandhinagar) has an average literacy rate of 65%, higher than the national average of 59.5%; with male literacy of 76% and female literacy of 51%. 15% of the population is under 6 years of age. ==References== Category:Cities and towns in Gandhinagar district
title: Chiloda (Naroda)
